TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 715
TEI.2.document_title: Thomas Davis to S M Williams, 11-28-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Thomas Davis to S. M. Williams, November 28, 1831. Draft on Austin for two " gentle cows and calves."
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 715

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Thomas Davis to S. M. Williams, November 28, 1831. Draft on Austin for two " gentle cows and calves."*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Willims*/person_mentioned* Sur Pleas Pay and to *person_mentioned*Thorn Davis*/person_mentioned* two gentle Cows and Calves and the amount shall be Credited on *person_mentioned*Mr Austen*/person_mentioned*s note *person_mentioned*Richd Andrews*/person_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Moza Ruzaw [Rousseau] */person_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-28-1831">Nov 28th 1831*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Pay the within To *person_mentioned*Henry Applewhite*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Thomas Davis*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
